articles.author: Kirsten Frattini
articles.title: 'I was ready to pace and he told me to attack' - Adam Yates answers Pogačar's improvised call on Pla d’Adet at the Tour de France - Cyclingnews
articles.description: 'It’s a little bit of improvisation' says Yates as Pogačar extends lead in the GC
articles.content: Adam Yates (UAE Team Emirates) was as surprised as everyone else when his teammate and yellow jersey Tadej Pogačar asked him to attack with just over seven kilometres to go on the final ascent of the… [+2490 chars]
